trans-unit.source: Allows security actions for <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission"></xref> to be applied to code using declarative security.
trans-unit.target: Permitir que as ações de segurança para <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission"> </xref> a serem aplicadas ao código usando a segurança declarativa.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction> value that is used.
trans-unit.target: O escopo da declaração que é permitido depende do <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>valor que é usado.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>

trans-unit.source: The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time.
trans-unit.target: As informações de segurança declaradas por um atributo de segurança são armazenadas nos metadados do atributo de destino e são acessadas pelo sistema em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: DataProtectionPermissionAttribute is used only for declarative security.
trans-unit.target: DataProtectionPermissionAttribute é usado apenas para a segurança declarativa.

trans-unit.source: For imperative security, use the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: Para segurança obrigatória, use a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission>classe.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionAttribute"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionAttribute"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria e retorna um novo <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method should only be called by the security system, never by application code.
trans-unit.target: Esse método só deve ser chamado pelo sistema de segurança, nunca pelo código do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: At compile time, attributes convert security declarations to a serialized form in metadata.
trans-unit.target: Em tempo de compilação, atributos convertem declarações de segurança para um formato serializado em metadados.

trans-unit.source: Declarative security data in metadata is created from the permission that this method returns.
trans-unit.target: Dados de segurança declarativa em metadados são criados a partir da permissão que esse método retorna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission"></xref> that corresponds to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission"> </xref> que corresponde ao atributo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data protection permissions.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as permissões de proteção de dados.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionFlags"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionFlags"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionFlags"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether data can be encrypted using the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os dados podem ser criptografados usando o <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `false`, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> occurs when the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.Protect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `false`, um <xref:System.Security.SecurityException>ocorre quando o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.Protect%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método é chamado.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.Protect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data can be encrypted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os dados podem ser criptografados; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether memory can be encrypted using the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedMemory"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica a memória pode ser criptografada usando o <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedMemory"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `false`, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> occurs when the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedMemory.Protect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `false`, um <xref:System.Security.SecurityException>ocorre quando o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedMemory.Protect%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método é chamado.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedMemory.Protect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if memory can be encrypted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a memória pode ser criptografada; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether data can be unencrypted using the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os dados podem ser descriptografados usando a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: If this value is `false`, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> occurs when the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.Unprotect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Se esse valor for `false`, um <xref:System.Security.SecurityException>ocorre quando o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.Unprotect%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método é chamado.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.Unprotect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data can be unencrypted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os dados podem ser descriptografados; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether memory can be unencrypted using the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedMemory"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a memória pode ser descriptografada usando o <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedMemory"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: If this value is `false`, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> occurs when the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedMemory.Unprotect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Se esse valor for `false`, um <xref:System.Security.SecurityException>ocorre quando o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedMemory.Unprotect%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método é chamado.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedMemory.Unprotect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if memory can be unencrypted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a memória pode ser descriptografada; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
